welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stanwell, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi available throughout the airport. Premium option available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A designated terminal for private flights and VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact facility, offering a seamless travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: The Private Jet Centre at London City Airport caters to the needs of private and business jet travelers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and spacious terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Benson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
